TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit FeatureGateEndpointFilterExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Extension methods that provide feature management integration for ASP.NET Core endpoint building.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IEndpointConventionBuilder WithFeatureGate (this Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IEndpointConventionBuilder builder, params string[] features);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IEndpointConventionBuilder WithFeatureGate(class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IEndpointConventionBuilder builder, string[] features) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function WithFeatureGate (builder As IEndpointConventionBuilder, ParamArray features As String()) As IEndpointConventionBuilder

Docs.param: The collection of feature flags to evaluate.
Docs.summary: Adds a filter to the endpoint that gates access based on whether one or more features are enabled. All features must be enabled for access to be granted.
Docs.returns: The endpoint convention builder for chaining.

Docs.param: Specifies whether all or any of the provided features should be enabled in order to pass.
The collection of feature flags to evaluate.
Docs.summary: Adds a filter to the endpoint with specified requirement type for multiple features.
Docs.returns: The endpoint convention builder for chaining.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IEndpointConventionBuilder WithFeatureGate (this Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IEndpointConventionBuilder builder, bool negate, params string[] features);

The collection of feature flags to evaluate.
Docs.summary: Adds a filter to the endpoint with negation capability for multiple features.
